title: Climate crisis or a warning from God? Iranians desperate for answers as water dries up
description: As rainy season fails to bring relief, authorities try cloud seeding – while others across the country pray for a miracle
content: Water, and its absence, has become Iran’s national obsession. In the mosques of northern Tehran the imams have been praying for rain, while the meteorologists count down the hours until the weather is forecast to break and rain is finally due to fall... [5565 chars]

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene doubles down on calls to release Epstein files
description: In a new interview, the congresswoman continued to urge the files' release despite the US president's harsh opposition.
content:
Republican congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene is reiterating her calls for the release of all Epstein files, after US President Donald Trump called her a "traitor" and said he no longer supports her.

title: Parrott hat-trick as Republic of Ireland stun Hungary to reach World Cup play-offs
description: Troy Parrott completes a hat-trick with virtually the last kick of the game as the Republic of Ireland come from behind to stun Hungary and reach the World Cup play-offs.
content:
That the Republic of Ireland even had the chance to make the play-offs next March was remarkable.
After picking up just one point from the first three games - a loss to Armenia unquestionably the low-point - the Irish breathed new life into their cam... [2235 chars]

title: Parrott hat-trick sickens Hungary as Ireland grab World Cup playoff spot in wild win
description: An injury-time goal by Troy Parrott to complete his hat-trick booked Republic of Ireland a spot in the playoffs for next year’s World Cup with a thrilling 3-2 comeback victory over their nearest Group F rivals Hungary
content:
An injury-time goal by Troy Parrott to complete his hat-trick booked Republic of Ireland a spot in the playoffs for next year’s World Cup with a thrilling 3-2 comeback victory over their nearest Group F rivals Hungary in a must-win game in Budapest.

title: Albania vs England LIVE: World Cup 2026 Qualifier score, stats & updates
